title: Koufuku wa Kimi no Tonari ni
sinopse:
1. Koufuku wa Kimi no Tonari ni (Happiness Is Always Beside You)
2. Koufuku wa Ore no Tonari (Happiness Is Always Beside Me)
3. Majime na Koi wo Hajimeyou (I'll Begin an Honest Love)
4. Himitsu wo Ageru yo (I'll Share My Secret With You)
5. Wazawai Tenjite Minoru Koi (Turn a Misfortune Into a Blessing)
6. Koufuku wa Kimi to Tomo ni (Happiness Is Being With You)
